snippet: When Facebook files for a public stock offering, as it is expected to do on Wednesday, it will be moving to cash in on the vast pile of personal data it has accumulated, Somini Sengupta and Evelyn M. Rusli report in Wednesday's Times.
abstract: When Facebook files for a public stock offering, as it is expected to do on Wednesday, it will be moving to cash in on the vast pile of personal data it has accumulated, Somini Sengupta and Evelyn M. Rusli report in Wednesday's Times.

headline.main: Daily Report: Facebook's Offering, Fueled by You
